name: Skyland's Star
description:
Skyland's Star is a science fiction text adventure game in the spirit of the classic Infocom adventures. With a sophisticated parser, a huge map, and an intriguing story line, Skyland's Star will be a welcome trip down memory lane for long-time gamers.

In Skyland's Star, you take on the role of a scientist recruited to time-travel into Earth's future. Present day Earth is in desperate trouble. The rapid population growth and ever increasing need for energy has all but depleted the world's fossil fuels, and science has been unable to fully replace them with a safe alternative. You must time-travel into the future to find out how (and if) the citizens of the future Earth handled the problem, and then return to the present day so that the knowledge can be put to use. This will be possible using an advanced, but still experimental, process that makes time travel possible...

Skyland's Star is a throwback to classic text adventure games, and features:

  • An intricate and intelligent plot.
  • Nearly 150 unique locations.
  • A parser that recognizes approximately 1,500 words.
  • An estimated play time of 25 hours!

The game download also includes:

  • A complete set of Game Maps revealing every location in the game.
  • A full Walkthrough showing every move needed to win!
